channel.title: Randoms on Nothing Owned
channel.description: Recent content in Randoms on Nothing Owned

item.title: Time Long Past
item.description: A young boy fancy oversized K-pop clothes, blood-racing video games, climbing over the walls, on a barren hill, looking above the sky while drinking a bottle of one dollar water. He found joys playing big score over rusty rims, imagining himeself being T-Mac. Once school was off, grabbing the beat-up bag, furiously, longingly, hurriedly, he run. He showed up in dim-light video-game rooms, rowdy basketball fields, and teachers’ offices. Youth is always enchated with endless curiosity and passion.
